'Maya Ying Lin' (born October 5, 1959) is an American architectural designer and
artist who is known for her work in sculpture and landscape art. She is best
known as the designer of the Vietnam Veterans Memorial in Washington, D.C.
categories: Members of the American Academy of Arts and Letters
United States National Medal of Arts recipients
headings: Work after the Vietnam Veterans Memorial
